title: Breaking.the.Taboo.2012.480p.HDTV.XviD.AC3-spinzes.avi
description:
Breaking the Taboo is a 2011 documentary film about the War on Drugs. The film recounts the history of the war on drugs, beginning with the 1961 Single Convention on Narcotic Drugs. Breaking the Taboo explores the conclusion reached by the Global Commission on Drug Policy in 2011 that drug liberalization is the best approach in dealing with drug policy.

This is the English version originally released on 07-Dec-2012.
